AboutMe.heading: About me
AboutMe.introText: I am a high school graduate aspiring to be a software engineer who enjoys coding. At Centennial, I am a student of the Software Engineering Technician Program. My interests include reading, watching Youtube and listening music.
AboutMe.missionStatement: Strive to be a good software engineer who never stops learning and spreading knowledge
